replies.msg:
上網睇到去澳洲working holiday 有人直頭草到首期，即刻可以搵到好多錢...
而新西蘭我貪佢文化好正，真正咁體驗生活
所以宜家都未有結論揀邊個國家。

有冇ching去過指點下？

喺澳洲～
唔知係咪經濟麻麻地
搵工好難

Why don’t you work as a personal trainer or gym assistant or receptionist at a gym 🏋🏻‍♀️down under? You might learn lots of things and meet many new friends 👫 By the way one of my friends opened a shop 🏬which sells gym equipment. He’s got one hundred and sixty three thousand dollars’ worth of gym equipment in his shop 🏬Over eighty two thousand dollars’ of equipment has been shipped worldwide over the last eleven months, many of which were shipped to gyms worldwide 🌎If you are or know anyone who might be interested feel free to contact me. I’ll make it worth your while
你去做雞咪有....人講你信

而家匯率低 又要交稅
唔做旨意搵到錢
